subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=24|rad=十|as=03|sn=5|four=90500|canj=FQ|ids=⿻丷⿻二丨(GHTJV),⿻八⿻二丨(K)}}

# Shuōwén Jiězì radical №18

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*par}}. Related to {{och-l|畔|bank between fields}}, which is an endopassive of {{och-l|半|half}}, ''lit.'' "be separated from".
